Through events, webinars, and outreach, CLMS showcased its impact, from biodiversity monitoring to urban resilience. The launch of the National Collaboration Programme further strengthened ties with users, reinforcing CLMS’s commitment to empowering stakeholders and supporting sustainable solutions across Europe and beyond.Read articleView all feature articles

As Europe’s new policy cycle begins, Commission President-elect’s political guidelines and mission letters to future Commissioners reaffirm the course towards sustainability, while adding extra focus on competitiveness and security to boost Europe’s resilience to current and future crises. ...
